We collect information from you when you register on our site, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, respond to a survey, fill out a form or visit us at an event.
We collect information under the direction of our customers and often have no direct relationship with the individuals whose personal information we process.
We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others rights, property, or safety.
We will retain your information for as long as your account is active, or as reasonably necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Policy unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
We collect and store content that you create, submit, post, upload, transmit, store or display in the process of using SUMO or our websites.

We use cookies to understand and save your preferences for future visits and compile aggregate data about site traffic and site interaction so that we can offer better site experiences and tools in the future.
However, non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses.

We may disclose your information, including your personal data, to a third party if (a) we believe that disclosure is reasonably necessary to comply with any applicable laws and regulation or governmental request through court order or subpoena, (b) to enforce our contracts, policies, and terms of service, (c) to protect the security or integrity of our services (d) to protect SUMO, our customers or the public from harm or illegal activities, or (e) to respond to an emergency which we believe in the good faith requires us to disclose information.
